# Education

🎓 Doctor of Philosophy, Molecular Genetics from La Trobe University, 2014

🎓 Bachelor of Agricultural Science, Rural Technology from the University of Queensland, 2010

## About Me

Dr Luke Pembleton is a Genomic Breeding Scientist and Strategic Science Manager at Barenbrug. He leads the development and implementation of commercial genomic breeding and associated 'omic' technologies.

## Interest and Skills

Most of my technical work is focused on the fields of 🧬 **Genomics**, **Genomic Selection** and **Genomic Breeding** in plants, primarily **forages** 🌱. Skilled in **bioinformatics** 👨‍💻 and passionate about the **R** programing language. Enjoy developing **cloud computing** ☁️ environments for research and production pipelines, often orchestrated with the workflow manager **Nextflow** 🔂.
